name: weboot
description: Quickly and easily make a web application bootstrap program
author: maolion <maolion.j@gmail.com>

scripts.build:bootstrap-lib: tsc src/types.d.ts src/bootstrap.lib.ts -t ES5 --newLine lf --outFile dist/bootstrap.lib.js --strict true --noImplicitReturns true --noUnusedLocals true
